rules.text: Every user must be at least 18 years old.
Explicit media is allowed if it is original, 18+, and does not violate the rights of any other person.
Pseudonyms are encouraged, and doxxing is prohibited.
Stay safe. Content that has the purpose or predominant effect of harming others is prohibited.
Be nice. Common decency is a must. (There is no list of officially banned content or isms and phobias.)
